short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let it snow during web browsing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feel the magic of winter without leaving home. Just install extension and make your web browsing a magical experience.

Snow can be enabled/disabled by clicking extension icon. Disabled icon is represented by cloud without any snowflakes.
